title: Find the Conditional Frequency
question_text: Suppose you are told to find the conditional frequency for a cell in column $2$ of a two-way table.  Which of the following should you do to find that conditional frequency?

choices.text: Divide the cell value by the total of the entire table.
Divide the cell value by the total of column 2 2 .
Divide the cell value by the number of columns.
Divide the cell value by the number of rows.
Divide the cell value by the sum of the number of rows and columns.
